thread.title: KuCoin Launches ZOO Fixed Promotion with 600% APR Starting Feb 27, 2025
thread.title_full: KuCoin Launches ZOO Fixed Promotion with 600% APR Starting Feb 27, 2025

title: KuCoin Launches ZOO Fixed Promotion with 600% APR Starting Feb 27, 2025
text:
Derived from The KuCoin Team, KuCoin Earn is set to launch the ZOO Fixed Promotion at 10:00:00 on February 27, 2025 (UTC). This promotion offers an expected annual percentage rate (APR) of 600% over a 30-day locking period, ending on March 29, 2025. The promotion will conclude once the hard cap is reached. Users can participate by staking their desired product on the KuCoin Earn website. The promotion has a soft cap of 100 for single users and a hard cap of 20,000,000 for single users and 16,000,000,000 for the whole platform. Participants must be registered on KuCoin, and the APR and caps may be adjusted based on market conditions. KuCoin emphasizes that this is a risk investment channel and advises users to be aware of the risks involved. The KuCoin Group is not liable for any investment gains or losses.
